title: Mount Lofty Ranges: a total picture
brief_description: Investigates how life in this delicate ecological system affects all South Australians and the conservation and development options now necessary to protect our environmentally threatened Ranges. It asks the question “Can we cater for the changing land - use demands and still maintain a balanced environment?”
